page.title: 14The Wendover Commuter
page.content: People choose to live or retire in Wendover because of its picturesque setting, selective education system or rail service to London and Aylesbury, the main centres of employment. Local work is found in shops, offices and the Halton RAF Camp. Hurry! Hurry! I'll be late. My neighbour's at his garden gate "Where's my suitcase? Where's my hat?" "Get out of the way, you stupid cat!" He slams the door with a clatter of feet, His neighbour's half way down the street. Running fast down Dobbins Lane, he gets a stitch - Oh what a pain! Then from the station a screeching sound - as wheels start sparking off the ground, And as the train gets under way, A Wendover businessman starts his day.
